duties_responsibilities.duty: Scheduling patients using EHR Scheduling System and managing work queues.
Verifying insurance for eligibility and authorization status.
Managing patient flow, by registering patients, arriving patients in the EHR Scheduling System, and monitoring waiting times.
Completing administrative tasks such as distributing mail, photocopying, filing, faxing, tubing, and data entry.
Assisting with the orientation of new staff via mentoring.
Participating in process improvement initiatives within the department(s) and the organization.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. One year of work experience in a health care facility or graduation from an accredited medical secretarial or paramedical program.
